response.explain: The previous action code successfully moved the robot to the stove without any errors. The next step in the original subtasks is to turn on the stove.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge
(2) Open the fridge
(3) Take the bacon out of the fridge
(4) Move the robot to the stove
(5) Turn on the stove
(6) Cook the bacon on the stove
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 5: Turn on the stove
    stove = registry(env,"stove_rgpphy_0")
    toggle_on(robot, stove)
    donothing(env)
